Text: No comments on quality i guess that could be a good thing..

To be fair, it's eztv. If there were problems with the quality it would be a rare and mysterious thing.

Thanks guys.

I'm watching on my LG BD390 Network Player. All previous seasons of True Blood have looked fantastic, however these new season 5 IMMERSE episodes stutter when I watch them. It's particularly visible during camera panning. I have not changed anything in my setup, and my TV accepts 24p material. Anyone else with this problem?
